name: Warden's Sword
description: An enchanted silver sword that can cut through supernatural defenses and harm creatures immune to normal weapons.
permissions: Must be a Warden of the White Council
costs: Requires regular maintenance and proper storage

name: Shield Bracelet
description: A focus item that helps channel defensive magic, providing bonuses to blocking with evocation.

name: Blasting Rod
description: A focus item for offensive evocation, providing bonuses to attack rolls with evocation.

name: Enchanted Duster
description: A leather duster enchanted with protective spells, acting as light armor.
permissions: Must have Thaumaturgy or know an enchanter

name: Potion Slots
description: The ability to prepare magical potions in advance for later use.
permissions: Must have Thaumaturgy with crafting specialization
costs: Requires time and materials to prepare

name: Sanctum
description: A place of power under your control, providing bonuses to magical workings performed there.
permissions: Must own or control the location

name: Demesne
description: A portion of the Nevernever under your control, accessible from your sanctum.
permissions: Must have a Sanctum and significant magical power

name: White Council Membership
description: Full membership in the White Council of Wizards, with voting rights and obligations.
permissions: Must be a wizard of sufficient power and standing
costs: Subject to the Laws of Magic and Council politics

name: Accords Membership
description: Recognition as a freeholding lord under the Unseelie Accords.
permissions: Must have sufficient supernatural power or backing
costs: Must honor the Accords and accept challenges

name: Summer Knight Mantle
description: The power and authority of the Summer Knight.
permissions: Must be chosen by the Summer Queen

name: Winter Knight Mantle
description: The power and authority of the Winter Knight.
permissions: Must be chosen by the Winter Queen

name: Sword of the Cross
description: One of three holy swords empowered by faith to fight evil.
permissions: Must be chosen as a Knight of the Cross
